attributes.action: Implore that the digital switch-over of TV should not disadvantage large areas of Scotland and other rural communities by restricting channels while making them pay a full license fee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When researching the digital switch-over of TV I could see that a substantial area of the country is to have a second class digital terrestrial TV service. I think this is an outrage in one of the richest country’s in the world and victimizes the rural communities.
